name: I Can Fly
description:
Game done for LD50

Plot

One guy though he could fly... but he couldn't. He will fall down, but you can try to make him avoid the ground.

Controls

Left and right arrows to move horizontally

Space to shoot the cannon

M to go to the menu

Credits

Dev & 3D models: SAÜL Matthieu

Voices : CALABRESE Quentin

External resources

Unity, Blender

Sounds from Zapsplat.com

Sounds from Zelda ocarina of time

Music from https://www.bensound.com/

Font - Bebas Neue by Dharma Type

Thanks

Thanks to Cyrille for fixing my typos.

Thanks to everyone for their feedback !
